name: Facebook New (Clean, Fixed, Gray & Calibri) - AIO
description:
This is new design of Facebook withe all ads removed, fixed styled font, gray colored background and with all new interface. It has many edits and you will love it all..

I call it "AIO FACEBOOK" as it is all in one pack of Facebook.

-If you find any bug please report me asap.

-Copyrights logonaniket 2009.
Designed by Aniket
